parameter.name: sendInterval
parameter.description: Interval between 2 sending processes. The interval has influence how often information is updated.

parameter.name: minimumArrivalWeight
parameter.description: The minimum weight of an arrival to be used for magnitude calculations.

group.name: summaryMagnitude
group.description: The summary magnitude is building a weighted summary above all defined magnitude types. The single magnitude value is multiplied with the magnitude type specific weight. This is summed up for all magnitude types and the resulting sum is divided through the sum of all weights.

parameter.name: type
parameter.description: Define the type/name of the summary magnitude.

parameter.name: minStationCount
parameter.description: This is the minimum station magnitude required for any magnitude to contribute to the summary magnitude at all. If this is set to 4 then no magnitude with less than 4 station magnitudes is taken into consideration even if this results in no summary magnitude at all. For this reason, the default here is 1 but in a purely automatic system it should be higher, at least 4 is recommended.

parameter.name: blacklist
parameter.description: Define the magnitude types to be excluded from the summary magnitude calculation.

parameter.name: whitelist
parameter.description: Define the magnitude types to be included in the summary magnitude calculation.

group.name: coefficients
group.description: Define the coefficients to calculate the weight of a magnitude. weight = a*magStationCount+b

parameter.name: a
parameter.description: Define the coefficients a. Unnamed values define the default value.

parameter.name: b
parameter.description: Define the coefficients b. Unnamed values define the default value.

parameter.name: magnitudes
parameter.description: Definition of magnitude types to be calculated from amplitudes.

parameter.name: average
parameter.description:
Defines the average method to use when computing the network magnitude. To define the average method per magnitude type append the type, eg: "magnitudes.average = default, MLv:median"
The default behaviour is to compute the mean if less than 4 contributed station magnitudes exist otherwise a trimmed mean of 25 percent is used. Options are "default", "mean" and "trimmedMean".

option.description: Time span in hours after which objects expire.

Defines an event parameters XML file to be read and processed. This implies offline mode and only processes all origins contained in that file. It computes magnitudes for all picks associated with an origin where amplitudes are available and outputs an XML file that additionally contains station- and network magnitudes.
Reprocess also network magnitudes with an evaluation status set but do not change weights and just add new contributions with weight 0.
